sentences.en: At this defiant heresy, Mammy's brow lowered with indignation.
sentences.cn: 听了这番不伦不类的犟话, 嬷嬷烦恼得皱紧了眉头.

sentences.en: Fatigue and stress quickly result in a dull complexion and a furrowed brow.
sentences.cn: 疲劳和压力会很快导致肤色暗淡无光、额头出现皱纹。

sentences.en: He was on the look-out just below the brow of the hill.
sentences.cn: 他就在山脊下负责警戒。

sentences.en: He wiped his brow with the back of his hand.
He wiped the sweat from his brow with his hands.
sentences.cn: 他用手擦去了额头上的汗.

sentences.en: His brow corrugated with the effort of thinking.
sentences.cn: 他皱着眉头用心地思考.

sentences.en: His shaggy grey hair fell loosely across his brow.
sentences.cn: 他凌乱的白发蓬松地搭在额头.

sentences.en: I have no brow of such a pedagogical tone.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢这种学究的口吻.

sentences.en: In a moment he was seated, diagonally opposite her, brow furrowed.
sentences.cn: 很快他便眉头紧蹙地在她斜对面落座了。

sentences.en: My bank manager furrowed his brow, fingered his calculator and finally pronounced "Aha!"
sentences.cn: 我的银行经理眉头紧锁，拨弄着计算器，最后终于“啊哈!”了一声。

sentences.en: The Inspector took out a handker-chief and mopped his brow.
sentences.cn: 检察员掏出手帕，擦了擦眉头。

sentences.en: The nurse mopped his fevered brow.
sentences.cn: 护士擦拭了他发烫的前额。

sentences.en: The years have set their mark on his brow.
sentences.cn: 年岁在他的额上打下了印记.

trans.tran_en: the part of your face above your eyes and below your hair
